@FinnDinneen Baring Head is also worth the shortish walk. Oh, and for nature, Kāpiti Island.
@FinnDinneen for hiking, the Tararua. For ocean, Castle Point and Cape Palliser, For cutesy village, Paekak.
@FinnDinneen thanks. I find Wellington never runs out of offerings for photographers :)
@TKRobb thanks. It's my favourite Tararua hut so far. Though I'm keen to get to Tarn Ridge
@cupoteacoast thanks, will do. This is a panorama from Maungahuka Hut's deck during a cloud storm. https://t.co/Jvv5kHVeZb
You can see the red-roof hut in middle on left. The spur going down below it leads to a plane wreck.
